pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick wall / floor / stairs texture from a pre-set list on inspector

content.raw: By the way, I didn't manage to make folding `Set3dTransparency` into `Set3dTexture` work, or even `visual->SetTransparency` right after `visual->SetMaterial`. The transparency value does change, but not the rendered visual. It seems that the transparency only sticks if set a while after, like when the user selects->deselects the item.
